channel.title: Process on tanaike
channel.description: Recent content in Process on tanaike

item.title: Updated: GAS Library - ProcessApp
item.description: ProcessApp was updated to v1.0.1. v1.0.1 (February 10, 2019) New method of getExecutionTimeOfProcessType() was added. This method retrieves the total execution time of all functions by filtering the process type. For example, the total execution time of Web Apps can be retrieved. You can see the detail information here https://github.com/tanaikech/ProcessApp

item.title: GAS Library - ProcessApp
item.description: Overview This is a library for retrieving the process and information of Google Apps Script. Methods getExecutionTimeOfTrigger() : This method retrieves the total execution time of all functions executed by the time-driven trigger at owner’s account. For example, you can know the total execution time of all functions executed by the time-driven trigger in 24 h. getDevUrl() : This method retrieves the endpoint of developer mode for Web Apps like https://script.
